entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: 'Catizen' Airdrop With HashKey, 'Ragnarok' Ronin Beta
entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.title: Forgotten Runiverse Open Beta Billed as 'Coming Out Party' for Ethereum Franchise
entry.summary: The co-founder of Forgotten Runes believes the Ronin-based MMORPG will help push the project to become a “global franchise.”

entry.title: ‘Hamster Kombat’, Other TON Games Protest Arrest of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov
entry.summary: Prominent games built on Telegram have joined many in the crypto and tech communities in solidarity against the Saturday arrest of Pavel Durov.

entry.title: Here Are Today’s ‘Rocky Rabbit’ Enigma and SuperSet Daily Combo Solutions
entry.summary: You can earn millions of free in-game coins in the Telegram game Rocky Rabbit. Here are the solutions for Sunday, August 25.

entry.title: Here Are Today’s ‘X Empire’ Elon Musk Game Daily Combo and Riddle
entry.summary: Looking for the X Empire daily combo and riddle solution for Sunday, August 25? Here are the latest boosts for the Telegram crypto game.

entry.title: Omni-Chain Approach Vital to Ethereum’s Future: Orbiter Co-Founder
entry.summary: With greater interconnectivity, Iris Cheung said layer-2 solutions will be able to compete on usability.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Sunday, August 25? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: Professor Coin: Is There a ‘Free Lunch’ in Cryptocurrency Markets?
entry.summary: A pair of recent academic studies show how crypto arbitrage has evolved—and its effect on the cryptocurrency market.

entry.title: ‘Ragnarok: Monster World’ Beta Teases a Sharp Ethereum Riff on ‘Clash Royale’
entry.summary: PREVIEW: This Ronin-based mobile spinoff from the classic Ragnarok Online is very familiar—but also slick and entertaining.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: McDonald’s Gets Rugged, Bitcoin Fan RFK Backs Trump
entry.summary: It was a good week to be a degen as the golden arches presented an irresistable opportunity.

entry.title: What Is ‘Bitcoin Miner’? This Free iOS and Android Game Pays Real BTC
entry.summary: Bitcoin Miner turns the crypto mining grind into a colorful mobile game, plus it pays you actual BTC for playing. Here’s what you need to know.

entry.title: TON Price Plunges 17% After Telegram CEO Pavel Durov Arrested in France: Report
entry.summary: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was reportedly arrested in France on Saturday over charges related to illegal activity on the messaging platform.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Touts Ethereum’s Strength, Sets AI Event
entry.summary: At an upcoming conference in November, the Ethereum co-founder said "we're not just going to be talking about the crypto things.”

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Sideways Days Slide into a Bitcoin Rise
entry.summary: It was a sleepy week until Friday, when a number of fast-breaking news items led to an increase in prices for most major coins and tokens.

entry.title: How Companies Tap Virtual Reality and AI to Boost Mental Health
entry.summary: An international research study showed how immersive VR environments show promise in treating anxiety, depression, and PTSD.

entry.title: AI Could Make Coders Obsolete in Two Years, AWS Chief Predicts
entry.summary: Amazon Web Services CEO Matt Garman is not the first to envision AI doing the bulk of software development.

entry.title: SEC Lawsuit Against Kraken Can Move Forward, Judge Rules
entry.summary: A federal judge in California did not dismiss the lawsuit, but Kraken said the ruling was still good for its case.

entry.title: RFK Jr.’s Suspended White House Bid Creates Chaos on Polymarket
entry.summary: Bettors watched to see if Robert F. Kennedy Jr. would drop out—with semantic debates prompting odds to plummet as low as 6%.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bull RFK Jr. Suspends Presidential Campaign, Will Support Trump
entry.summary: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said he'll bow out of swing states and support fellow Bitcoin fan Donald Trump, in an effort to keep Kamala Harris from winning the election.

entry.title: WazirX to Begin Indian Rupee Withdrawals, But Keep Users' Crypto Frozen After Hack
entry.summary: WazirX users will be able to withdraw up to 66% of their Indian rupees starting Monday, about a month after funds were frozen due to a security breach.

entry.title: 'Crack Head Dev' Smokes Drugs, Fakes Death, and Dreams of Making Millions With Meme Coins
entry.summary: A Solana "meme coin dev" smoked drugs, faked his own death, and hung out with a stripper on stream. This is his story.

entry.title: El Salvador Now Holds $361 Million in Bitcoin as Nation Buys 1 BTC Daily
entry.summary: The Central American country is steadily accumulating Bitcoin, with El Salvador now holding nearly 6,000 BTC.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 186 - AVAX LEADS PUMP
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$65m, ETH ETFs: -$1m. Crypto stays range-bound ahead of Powell speech. Russia plans stablecoins of BRICS countries. El Salvador buys 162 BTC with daily buys. AVAX up 15% as Grayscale launches trust. Tron removes 12k BTC from USDD reserves. Trump promotes crypto DeFi project. Crypto half of corporate political donations. Tether abandons plan to launch its own blockchain. Sony backed L2 set to launch in weeks. Babylon launches BTC staking. CZ leaves prison for ‘halfway house’. PayPal & Anchorage partner for bank crypto rewards. Bitcoin mining market worth $74bn: JP Morgan. Bitfarms buys Stronghold in ‘strategic defence’.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 185 - KAMALA 'SUPPORTS' CRYPTO?
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$40m, ETH ETFs: -$18m. BTC breaks channel, ripe for ‘short squeeze’. BTC OI rises $1.3bn post Fed minutes. Kamala ‘supports crypto policies’ says advisor. Vitalik ‘bull posts’ ETH. Story Protocol raises $80m for L1. WazirX halts open orders after problems with Rupee. Coinbase & Ripple lead political donations. Salame claims government reneged on plea deal. EigenLayer team claimed coins despite being in US.

entry.title: 'Snow Crash' Author Neal Stephenson and Special FX Studio Wētā Debut New Metaverse Project
entry.summary: The best-selling author said Artefact will be an open metaverse that "provides a foundation that ensures long-term value and creative quality.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Rises as Fed Chair Jerome Powell Signals Rate Cut Is Imminent
entry.summary: Fed Chair Jerome Powell said Friday that the "time has come for policy to adjust," suggesting an interest rate cut is finally on the horizon.

entry.title: SEC Hits Back at Richard Heart's Motion to Dismiss $1 Billion Hex Case
entry.summary: Richard Heart filed to dismiss charges of selling $1 billion worth of unregistered securities—but the SEC disagrees with his claims.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Placid Ahead of Fed Chair Remarks in Jackson Hole
entry.summary: Analysts will be scrutinizing Powell's remarks, especially in light of the significant downward revision in US payrolls—the largest since 2009.

entry.title: India to Invite Industry Stakeholders to Help Shape Crypto Policy in Upcoming Consultation Paper
entry.summary: The Indian government is taking steps to shore up its domestic crypto policy as it attempts to juggle innovation with regulatory oversight.

entry.title: Australian Court Sides with Regulator in Case Against Kraken's Domestic Operator Bit Trade
entry.summary: The court found Bit Trade failed to comply with legal obligations regarding the design and distribution of Kraken's margin trading product.

entry.title: Sony’s Long-Awaited Ethereum Layer-2 Chain to Launch in Coming Weeks
entry.summary: Sony is expected to release technical documentation and tools for developers, providing firsthand experience, in the coming weeks.

entry.title: Justin Sun’s USDD Stablecoin Loses Bitcoin Backing
entry.summary: The move leaves USDD reliant on Tron's native token, TRX, which has surged with a recent meme coin push.

entry.title: Bitfarms Acquisition of Bitcoin Miner Stronghold a ‘Strategic’ Move Against Rival Riot: Experts
entry.summary: Bitfarms appears to be making itself a more challenging target for its competitor, which has been gunning for a takeover for over a year.

entry.title: SpaceX Preps for Historic Spacewalk with Polaris Dawn Mission
entry.summary: The SpaceX mission will test new laser communication technology and feature the first commercial spacewalk.

entry.title: Trump Extends Lead Over Harris on Polymarket Despite Polls
entry.summary: Why do Polymarket and poll analyst Nate Silver currently have different predictions about the outcome of the presidential election?

entry.title: Feds Will Contact Victims of Million-Dollar Crypto Scam 'via NFT’ After Founder's Guilty Plea
entry.summary: Law enforcement will use NFTs to reach out to victims impacted by fraudulent activity from the founder of crypto project CluCoin.

entry.title: Crypto, AI Heavyweights Backed Elon Musk’s Twitter Takeover
entry.summary: The full X shareholder list was unsealed after a court order, naming names behind the $44 billion acquisition.

entry.title: Ex-Congressional Candidate Charged With Illegally Using FTX Cash to Fund Failed Campaign
entry.summary: The charges come a day after lawyers for FTX executive Ryan Salame asked a judge to prevent any indictment of Michelle Bond.

entry.title: Slack AI Vulnerability Could Have Exposed Data From Private Channels: Report
entry.summary: Security researchers uncovered a flaw in Slack's AI assistant that could have allowed hackers to extract confidential information from private channels—without any coding involved.

entry.title: Trump Disavows AI Taylor Swift Images: ‘I Didn't Generate Them’
entry.summary: After sharing fake “Swifties for Trump” photos on Truth Social, the former president says AI is “very dangerous.”

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 184 - PUNKS ARE FLYING!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$88m, ETH ETFs: -$7m. BTC funding negative in ‘short squeeze’ setup. BTC dominance up 18% in 2 years. TRX leads L1s as memecoin activity soars. Chance of SOL ETF is zero in 2024: Bloomberg. Another SOL ETF approved in Brazil. Binance & CZ face new class action lawsuit. Tether to launch UAE-Dirham stablecoin. Mt Gox moves $700m in BTC. CRV founder faces backlash on DAO proposal.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 183 - WE ARE NOW SHITCOINING ON TRON
entry.summary: Crypto follows stocks higher, BTC rallies to $61k. SOL funds saw largest weekly outflow ever. Tether mints another $1bn on Tron. SEC blocked SOL ETF from CBoE. China classifies crypto for money laundering. DNC platform doesn’t mention crypto. Rumours Gensler may be Treasury Secretary pick. Chrome extension ‘Bull Checker’ leads to exploits. Genesis-linked wallet hacked for $238m. ADA drops out of the top 10 coins.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 182 - STABLECOIN CAP NEARS ATH
entry.summary: Crypto falls as soon as US stock futures open higher. Crypto funds saw $30m inflows last week. Stablecoin market cap nears ATH. US may increase crypto reporting standards. Justin Sun hints at lift to China crypto ban. Tether to launch USDT on Aptos. MATIC to POL migration on September 4th. TON leads L1s on continued gaming strength.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 181 - GIGA HITS $300M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$11m, ETH ETFs: -$40m. BTC hits $56k then rebounds, $176m liquidated. Schumer says crypto policy can pass this year. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Bernstein moves several BTC miners to ‘Outperform’. Miners raised $2.2bn in Q2 to help cash crunch. EigenLayer TVL falls $351m after airdrop controversy. ARB announces staking. S. Korea pension fund buys $34m of MicroStrategy. Coinbase allows gold & oil futures trading.

entry.title: This Hedge Fund Buys Meme Coins. Here’s Why.
entry.summary: Crypto hedge fund Stratos bought Dogwifhat (WIF) when it was just 1 cent and has since continued investing in meme coins. We spoke with Rennick Palley, founder of Stratos, to hear the firm’s perspective on investing in these tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 180 - BTC BACK DOWN, AGAIN
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$81m, ETH ETFs: +$11m. Crypto falls as markets react negatively to CPI print. BTC whale buying slows, death cross on weekly. Low CPI print could still lead to BTC ATH: Grayscale. Exchanges see $1bn USDT withdrawal. US government sends $584m BTC to exchanges. Apple Pay may soon allow USDC payments. Schumer vows to pass crypto regulation this year. Morgan Stanley discloses $188m BTC ETF holding. Vanguard say they won’t do BTC ETFs. Marathon Digital buys $249m BTC. DeFi rises as Aave hits weekly high in borrowers. BitGo continues to stress autonomy from Justin Sun. Binance returns to India.

entry.title: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary Welcomes Crypto Regulation, Slams Celebrity 'Shitcoins'
entry.summary: Whether it's celebrity meme coins or Tom Brady, Canadian investor and "Shark Tank" star Kevin O'Leary tells it like it is. In this interview with Decrypt reporter André Beganski, O'Leary breaks down his approach to the crypto market and why "cowboys" became a thing of the past. Amid crypto's "renaissance" period, he sees prediction markets and stablecoins as bright spots, while regulation looks inevitable for a maturing industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 179 - PUMP FUN STILL RISING!
entry.summary: Crypto rallies ahead of key CPI data today. $2bn more Mt. Gox BTC readies to moved. Jump transfers another $46m ETH to sell. SOL stablecoin TVL up $1bn in the last 3 weeks. Goldman Sachs show $418m BTC ETF. BTC ETFs will soon surpass Satoshi’s holding. ETH L2 transactions hit record 12.4m. Harris advisors have poor history with crypto policy. Bitget wallet overtakes MetaMask by downloads. Coinbase say cbBTC wrapped Bitcoin coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 178 - TRUMP AND ELON ON X
entry.summary: SOLETH down 10% from ATH. Grayscale ETH ETF shows no outflows. Bitcoin slump due to rising Kamala odds: Bernstein. Alt season won’t return until BTC above $70k: Hayes. PayPal stablecoin on SOL flips ETH TVL. 3AC files $1.3bn claim against Terraform Labs. Marathon to stamp ‘Made in USA’ on mined BTC. Trump & Elon don’t mention crypto in interview. Coinbase urges SEC to abandon DeFi exchange rule. Several VCs receive SEC letters over Uniswap. OP hints at upcoming ‘Superchain’.

entry.title: Deadrop Co-Creator Discusses ‘Shock’ of Dr. Disrespect Allegations & Future Plans
entry.summary: More than a month after famed gaming influencer Dr. Disrespect was dropped by Midnight Society, the studio building the first-person shooter Deadrop, the team has finally broken its silence in an exclusive interview with Decrypt’s GG to discuss the move to remove the streamer from the company—and how the game can move forward.

entry.title: Gigachad: A Crypto Coin With An Alpha Male Mindset
entry.summary: Gigachad is a meme coin centered around a meme that originates from 2017 after a photographer posted a bodybuilder with an unrealistically insane body. He was later named ‘Gigachad’ by 4Chan users.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 176 - ETH LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: ETH leads gains in majors, ETHE outflows slowing. Putin signs crypto mining bill. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Tether plans to double staff to improve compliance. Turkey sees surge in exchange applications. SEC plans to appeal XRP ruling. Franklin Templeton launches fund on ARB. SUI leads altcoins after Grayscale fund announced. TIA rises 20%, will launch mainnet in September. STX will launch final Nakamoto Code this month. Coinbase questions CFTC prediction market rules.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 175 - THE FTX SAGA CONTINUES
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$45m, ETH ETFs: -$24m. XRP settles with SEC for $125m, rises 20%. FTX ordered to repay $12.7bn. BTC Mayer Multiple hits lowest since FTX. Saylor personally owns over $1bn BTC. Dems launch ‘Crypto for Harris’ group. Brazil approves first spot SOL ETF. Robinhood crypto revenue up 161%. Ethena launches stablecoin on SOL. Jump likely shut ‘development arm’, not trading. Nomad bridge hacker moves $35m to Tornado. Metaplanet to buy $6.8m more BTC. Binance to list TON for spot. Binance invests in SOL restaking protocol. Arbitrum Orbit chains to use USDC for gas.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 174 - SOL BOUNCES 40%
entry.summary: SOL continues to lead majors, memecoins run higher. SOL/ETH hits ATH, breaks key resistance level. BTC whales bought $23bn in last month. BTC volatility hits 20-month high. NASDAQ & BlackRock ask to list ETH options. ETH ETF inflows outpace BTC. BlackRock ETH ETF sees $900m inflows so far. New ETH L2 created ‘every 19 days’. $2bn of seized ETH transferred by Chinese police. Jump continues to exit ETH position. Move in Yen is opportunity to buy BTC: Hayes. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. DeFi revenues soar, AAVE makes $6m in one day. HyperLiquid sees record $4.3bn of trade volume. Binance saw $1.2bn inflows, biggest inflow of 2024. Nearly every Binance launchpad coin is now red. Kamala reschedules crypto leaders meetup.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 173 - ARE WE BACK?
entry.summary: BTC & ETH ETFs see huge $6bn of trading volume. ‘Real number’ of liquidations estimated at $7-9bn. 274k traders liquidated on move. 60% of top 50 coins now red for 2024. Trump says US should not sell crypto holdings. Bitcoin not as good a hedge as gold: Cramer. Ark buys $18m Coinbase stock in drop. Capula reports $460m BTC ETF holding. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 172 - A VERY RED DAY FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits $50k, liquidations hit $1bn in sell-off. Macro sell-off and end of Yen carry trade blamed. Multiple altcoins hit cycle or all-time lows. Bitcoin dominance rises to cycle-high of 58%. Robinhood halts 24hr trading. Crypto funds saw $528m outflow last week. Justin Sun denies liquidation rumours. Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‘zero issues’. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn’t even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.
